statements: UPDATE sculpture_resources SET description='Ancient sculpture depicting a mythical creature' WHERE resource_id=1;
UPDATE sculpture_resources SET technique_used='Marble carving', era='Classical' WHERE resource_id=3;
UPDATE sculpture_resources SET artist_name='Leonardo da Vinci', era='Renaissance' WHERE resource_id=1;
UPDATE sculpture_resources SET description='A beautiful contemporary art piece depicting nature', technique_used='Modern art' WHERE resource_id=2;
UPDATE SculptureHistory SET artist_name = 'Michelangelo', materials_used = 'Marble' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SculptureTechniques SET description = 'Ancient art technique' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE SculptureTechniques SET description = 'Modern technique used for contemporary sculptures' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SculptureHistory SET materials_used = 'Marble, Bronze' WHERE artist_name = 'Michelangelo' AND year_created = 1504;
UPDATE sculpture_techniques SET description = 'Abstract technique for modern art' WHERE technique_id = 1;
UPDATE sculpture_history SET year_created = 1850, artist_name = 'John Smith' WHERE history_id = 3;
UPDATE sculpture_techniques SET description = 'Ancient sculpture techniques' WHERE technique_id = 1;
UPDATE sculpture_history SET year_created = 1500, description = 'Renaissance sculpture history' WHERE artist_name = 'Michelangelo';
UPDATE SculptureTechniques SET technique_name = 'Carving' WHERE technique_id = 1;
UPDATE SculptureCurations SET curation_description = 'A curated collection of modern sculptures.' WHERE curation_id = 3;
UPDATE SculptureTechniques SET technique_name = 'Carving' WHERE technique_id = 1;
UPDATE SculptureResources SET resource_link = 'http://www.example.com/sculpture1' WHERE resource_id = 2;
UPDATE sculptures SET material = 'Marble' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE artists SET birth_year = 1985, nationality = 'Italian' WHERE name = 'Leonardo da Vinci';
UPDATE sculptures SET material = 'Bronze' WHERE name = 'David'
UPDATE artists SET nationality = 'French', birth_year = 1800, death_year = 1875 WHERE name = 'Rodin'
